title: Can You Draw These Super Mario Bosses? - Game Showdown
description:
Our most controversial game is back with a special guest, Simon Cardy from IGN!

Season 2 Ep. 13

Go to http://KindaFunny.com/MonsterHunterNow to play right now!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

The Kinda Funny Membership gets you Ad-Free and Exclusive Shows: https://www.youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames/join
http://www.patreon.com/KindaFunny 

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:50 - First Question & Housekeeping
00:03:48 - Portrait Mode Round 1
00:09:20 - Round 2
00:19:35 - Round 3
00:25:14 - Round 4
00:33:30 - BONUS ROUND
